verses.text: \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*: \w Speak|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w priests|strong="H3548"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* thou shalt \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Let|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* incur \w an|strong="H0559"\w* uncleanness \w at|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w death|strong="H5315"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w citizens|strong="H1121"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w only|strong="H0518"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* kin, such \w as|strong="H1121"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w near|strong="H7138"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w blood|strong="H7607"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* say, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w his|strong="H0518"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w also|strong="H3588"\w*,

\w And|strong="H0376"\w* \w for|strong="H0413"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* maiden \w sister|strong="H0269"\w*, \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w had|strong="H0834"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H2930"\w* \w the|strong="H3808"\w* prince \w of|strong="H1167"\w* \w his|strong="H3808"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* do \w any|strong="H3808"\w* thing \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H2930"\w* \w him|strong="H2930"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2930"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w shave|strong="H1548"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w beard|strong="H2206"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w make|strong="H7139"\w* incisions \w in|strong="H1320"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w*.

\w They|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* burnt \w offering|strong="H0801"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H1992"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* vile \w prostitute|strong="H2181"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w one|strong="H0376"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H0430"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w put|strong="H3947"\w* \w away|strong="H3947"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3947"\w* \w husband|strong="H0376"\w*: \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H0376"\w* \w consecrated|strong="H6918"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w their|strong="H3947"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*,

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* leaves \w of|strong="H0430"\w* proposition. \w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w also|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w holy|strong="H6918"\w*, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H0853"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* taken \w in|strong="H0376"\w* whoredom, \w and|strong="H3548"\w* dishonour \w the|strong="H0853"\w* name \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w her|strong="H3588"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w be|strong="H0376"\w* \w burnt|strong="H8313"\w* \w with|strong="H8313"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w*.

\w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w high|strong="H1419"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* say, \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w*, \w is|strong="H0834"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w greatest|strong="H1419"\w* \w among|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*. \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* unction hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* \w poured|strong="H3332"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w been|strong="H0834"\w* consecrated \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* priesthood, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w who|strong="H0834"\w* hath \w been|strong="H0834"\w* vested \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* holy vestments, \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* uncover \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* rend \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w garments|strong="H0899"\w*:

\w Nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H0935"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H0935"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w* \w person|strong="H5315"\w*: \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w even|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w defiled|strong="H2930"\w*:

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w go|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H4720"\w* \w places|strong="H4720"\w*, lest \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w holy|strong="H4720"\w* unction \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w shall|strong="H0802"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w virgin|strong="H1331"\w* unto \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*:

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w widow|strong="H0490"\w* \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w one|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H0802"\w* \w divorced|strong="H1644"\w*, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* defiled, \w or|strong="H0518"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w take|strong="H3947"\w*, \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3947"\w* maid \w of|strong="H0802"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* own \w people|strong="H5971"\w*:

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* mingle \w the|strong="H3588"\w* stock \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* kindred \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* common \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w nation|strong="H5971"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w him|strong="H3068"\w*.
\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*:

\w Say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*: Whosoever \w of|strong="H0376"\w* thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w throughout|strong="H1755"\w* \w their|strong="H1961"\w* families, hath \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H0175"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w Neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w shall|strong="H0376"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H0376"\w* minister \w to|strong="H0376"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w*: \w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w blind|strong="H5787"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w lame|strong="H6455"\w*, \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* little, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* great, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* crooked nose,

\w If|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w foot|strong="H7272"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w if|strong="H0834"\w* \w his|strong="H0834"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w broken|strong="H7667"\w*,

\w If|strong="H0176"\w* he \w be|strong="H5869"\w* crookbacked, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* blear eyed, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w have|strong="H5869"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* pearl \w in|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H0176"\w* \w eye|strong="H5869"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* continual \w scab|strong="H1618"\w*, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* dry scurf \w in|strong="H0176"\w* \w his|strong="H0176"\w* body, \w or|strong="H0176"\w* \w a|strong="H0176"\w* rupture:

Whosoever \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* hath \w a|strong="H7126"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w shall|strong="H3548"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H7126"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w offer|strong="H7126"\w* \w sacrifices|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w bread|strong="H3899"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.

\w He|strong="H0430"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* nevertheless \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w loaves|strong="H3899"\w*, \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w are|strong="H0430"\w* offered \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*,

\w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w enter|strong="H0935"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w within|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w veil|strong="H6532"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w approach|strong="H5066"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w blemish|strong="H3971"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w must|strong="H0853"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w defile|strong="H2490"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*. \w I|strong="H0589"\w* \w am|strong="H0589"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sanctify|strong="H6942"\w* \w them|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w therefore|strong="H4872"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w Aaron|strong="H0175"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w things|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w had|strong="H3478"\w* \w been|strong="H3605"\w* \w commanded|strong="H1696"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*.
